name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Charity Tab: Support Good Causes Effortlessly

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raise money for charity effortlessly with every new tab you open.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly raise money for charity and support a good cause with every new tab you open! 

While just sitting at home and browsing the internet, you can help out the environment, provide access to clean water and education, give emergency aid and much more! All without spending a single cent! Supporting charity has never been simpler! Join us in making the world a better place by downloading the extension now!

FEATURES
- Customize your new tab with our the many stunning backgrounds available or upload your own beautiful background instead
- Increase your efficiency with quick-links/bookmarks that allow you to access your favorite sites quickly and easily
- Quickly open google services through the quick apps menu
- Organize your daily tasks with the simple to-do list widget
- Support charity and good causes effortlessly

HOW IT WORKS
In order to earn the money we donate to charities, you will see three banner ads in the right corner of your new tab page, which are completely unobtrusive. Then we take the revenue from these ads and donate it to a good cause. We do ask that you please turn off any Ad-Blockers or white-list "charitytab.ml" in order to allow us to show you these ads. For instructions on how to do that visit: charitytab.ml/adblockers

PRIVACY
Your privacy matters to us. The new tab page contains advertisements which are delivered by our advertising partners. In order to show you ads you might be interested in, our partners collect anonymous data about you. For more info check out our privacy policy here: https://charitytab.ml/privacy-policy

SUPPORT
Email: support@charitytab.ml
Website: https://charitytab.ml

----------------------------------------------------

By using this add-on, you agree to the Charity Tab Terms & Conditions available at https://charitytab.ml/termsandconditions
